messages.content: Kkkk...u do it in Marathi n show it to me Tom

he story begins with some characters going about their lives before a disaster, maybe a family with children, a baby, old folks and their friends. The show what would happen to them if a disaster hits and there's no management. For example, a hurricane might tear apart their house and blow away small children playing outside. Show the surviving family members grieving for the loss of their home and loved ones. Then show that it can have a different, happier ending with disaster management. Show the same disaster, but this time the family is prepared and survives it better
